mapper.select:
select *,CASE WHEN RYBH NOT IN ( SELECT RYBH FROM HYXXB ) THEN 'HY' WHEN RYBH IN (select a.RYBH FROM (select RYBH,HYLX,HYZT,HYSJ,JSZT from HYXXB WHERE CONCAT(RYBH,HYSJ) IN ( SELECT CONCAT(RYBH,max(HYSJ))FROM HYXXB WHERE RYBH IS NOT NULL GROUP BY RYBH ) AND RYBH IS NOT NULL group by RYBH) a WHERE a.HYLX <> 'jcy' and a.HYZT='3' and a.JSZT='Y') THEN 'HY' ELSE 'UNHY' END isHy from ksryjbxx jb where jb.AREA_CODE=#{area_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (jb.MSG_OP <> 3 or jb.MSG_OP='' or jb.MSG_OP is null)
and jb.XM like CONCAT('%',#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and jb.RYBH like CONCAT('%',#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by isHy
select * from ksryjbxx where RYBH = #{rybh} group by RYBH
mapper.delete: update ksryjbxx set MSG_OP = 3,MSG_STATUS = 'NEW' where RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ksryjbxx where 1=1
and RYBH = #{rybh}
mapper.update: update ksryjbxx set RYBH = #{RYBH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BH = #{BH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FH = #{FH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XM = #{XM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BM = #{BM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XB = sysdate() where RYBH=#{RYBH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select XM from ksryjbxx where AJBS=(SELECT ajbs from ksryjbxx where RYBH=#{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
